main event: A brilliant object was observed in Aguada, Puerto Rico on July 23, 1965, moving in a semi-circular path and changing its color before disappearing.
interesting points: The object made a humming sound as it moved away., The object changed from a brilliant white light to a reddish orange glow., The observer estimated the object's speed to be approximately 3,400 mph., The observer was inside a building and reported the object moved low over the trees., The object seemed to obscure itself momentarily behind fog.
sighted object: a brilliant object with a reddish glow
witness description: A civilian who had been studying astronomy and unusual phenomena.
